name: Css

aliases.name: Node
aliases.comment:
A Css stylesheet node. It can be a Rule, an @Rule, a Declaration, a
Selector...

values.comment: For Property :- Value. Alias of assign.

values.name: assign
values.comment: Constructs a Declaration from a Property and a Value.

values.name: declare
values.comment: Constructs a Block from a Head (Node) and a Body (List of Node).

values.name: declares
values.comment: Constructs a Block from a Head (List of Node) and a Body (List of Node).

values.name: style
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: stylesheet
values.comment: Constructs an Html Style Element from a List of Node.
